name: ancient-brass-dragon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a detailed concept art of a heroic ancient brass dragon in a consistent painterly style reminiscent of traditional tabletop fantasy inspired by the medieval era, with emphasis on realistic musculature and unique limbs, and comparison to a human silhouette for size. The aurora includes gear crafted from grounded medieval-fantasy materials, no modern technology or signs, and reflects aquatic fantasy realism. The setting is in an underwater and sky merged zone, showcasing movement within the detailed environment. There should be visible evidence of subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents, adhering to a three-color palette of teals, deep blues, and sea greens with pearl highlights. Materials suggesting the effect of a pressure dome can also be seen. Avoid any modern signage, photoreal CGI styles, anime, or bloom glare. There should be no embedded text or words unless specified, and all symbols should be meaningful.
